name: JoyceMeyerEverydayMoments
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
New York Times bestselling author Joyce Meyer uses her personal history and the Bible to teach humorous and easy-to-understand lessons on how to conquer life’s problems. Each 90 second show provides you with inspiration, insight and motivation from God’s word to enjoy every life.

We have listened to your feedback and updated this skill to automatically deliver only one entry per day! 

If you have any issues or feedback, please contact us at ctate@joycemeyer.org. We'd love to hear from you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
